name: Legs Workout
description: A workout focused on lower body exercises targeting quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Perform squats with a barbell to target the quads and glutes.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Perform lunges with dumbbells to target the quads and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Use the leg press machine to target the quads.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlifts
exercises.description: Perform Romanian deadlifts with a barbell to target the hamstrings.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Perform calf raises with a barbell or machine to target the calves.
